string.text:
A lightweight and compact submachine gun designed for rapid-fire engagements in close-quarters combat. Featuring a folding stock, integrated suppressor compatibility, and a high rate of fire, it is ideal for special forces, law enforcement, and personal defense roles. Its modern polymer construction and ambidextrous controls make it an agile and reliable weapon for dynamic tactical scenarios.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Switzerland
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Brugger & Thomet
